resources.string: To enter the application you must have a Telegram account. Also, you must have access to the messenger to receive the verification code.
Send the code as an SMS

Check if the number is entered correctly. The number must start with a \"+\" sign, followed by your country code, followed by the main number. Also make sure there are no extra characters or spaces in the number.
The code must contain 5 numbers, no letters, spaces, or extra characters.
Requires phone calls permission to use the app in full
You don\'t have enough points. Top up your counter
The rewarded ad wasn\'t ready yet
Error caused by a user cancelling the purchase flow
Choose how many coins you need
It is not recommended to disable this service
This service allows you to catch the phone numbers of the user you have chosen and receive new notifications.
